name: subcults
description: Subcult connects underground and local music communities

scripts.build: cd web && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p dist && cp -r web/dist/* dist/
scripts.lighthouse: cd web && npm run build && cd .. && lhci autorun --config=lighthouserc.js
scripts.lighthouse:local: cd web && npm run build && cd .. && npx serve -l 9000 web/dist
